sub_title: Communicator, Marketer & Community Event Organizer @ 3x3 Unites
summary:
I am a Marketeer at heart. The best part of the job for me is to explore the world of data to derive creative strategies with people who are passionate and willing to work hard and disagree. I have a proven track record of success in developing and executing events and marketing campaigns that have resulted in increased brand awareness, engagement, and sales.

Experiences
______________________________________________________________________________
- American School of Milan. International baccalaureate graduate
- BA International Communication - PA, Entrepreneurship, PR, Marketing
- Co-founded a foundation for personal development
- Lived in 3 countries. Speak 3 languages fluently (ENG, IT, RUS)
- Designed product labels and communication products for Horeca Industry. 
- Organised sport events together with 3x3 Unites in Groningen. 

Highlights in Numbers
______________________________________________________________________________
- Bachelor degree - 4.0 GPA - 240 Credits
- Event Organization - 32 teams, 128 players. 200+ fans at the Martini Plaza. 
- 26 Communication Products for 8 clients in the Netherlands and Italy. 

Character
______________________________________________________________________________
- Resilient and and Vigorous.
- Action & Speed > Analysis.
- Communication is always key. #1 Rule: Pay attention. 
- Diplomatic and happy to connect with people.
- I value responsibility and leadership. 
- Cannot be angry at what is true. 

Skills
______________________________________________________________________________
- Digital and Graphic Design. Working with Adobe Suite. 
- Translating complex situations and markets into business plans
- Fact-based working and investigation
- Editing, post-production, conversationalist
- Leadership, management ability
- Presenting, public speaking, diplomacy and networking
